revisionDesc.change: checked; moved notes to external file and added ptrs
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Moved RMBucke to HandNote; fixed editor, date, and title; reviewed paragraphing
Replaced smart quotes with straight; removed external URL links; added Bucke
Corrected proofreading, added note on date, noted connection to Galaxy in previous letter duk.00505
Review and correct books to looks

body.p:
i have just received your welcome letter with the 10 dollers dollars all safe this time any how but the lasts last weeks week's one is gone shure sure i wouldent wouldn't be so worried for a trifle i tell you i have surmised every thing that was possible for an old granny to summise surmise i have read over the last letter you sent the 8th every hour or so) i had ought to have got this yesterday but i was thankfull thankful to get it to day today where doo do you have an idea the letter and money was taken i am inclined somewhat to think it never come to brooklyn Brooklyn but somebody got it O walt if you had only come last week but you must come about cristmasChristmas any how i thought you was sick and i fretted but its all past now and i think i wont won't be so foolish again but i suppose i should
if any thing of the kind occured occurred the Doctor has just been in to see me he says if this medicine dont don't help me he dont don't know as any thing will sometimes i think it will help me my appetite is better and i feel stronger than i did before i took it) matty and sis is here as usual hattie goes to school and improves very much in her studies and looks matt has just had a letter from Jeff he dont don't say when he shall come but i suppose when he can) have you heard from the galaxy Galaxy man how he feels about it if it meets his approbation i dont don't know as you can spell out this letter Walter write all about every thing you can think of
